title: Physiological, transcriptomic, and metabolomic analyses reveal that Pantoea sp. YSD J2 inoculation improves the accumulation of flavonoids in Cyperus esculentus L. var. sativus
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16
